Title: Suspected robbery gang planning operation
Description: Intelligence indicates group of 3 individuals planning armed robbery targeting mobile money booths in CBD area this weekend
SuspectInformation: 3 males, aged 20-30, using white Toyota Hilux
RecommendedAction: Increase patrols in CBD, monitor mobile money locations, brief patrol officers

Title: Drug distribution network operating from City Market
Description: Intelligence suggests drug dealers using market stalls as cover for distribution operations
RecommendedAction: Conduct undercover operations, coordinate with Drug Enforcement
